title: Orange Orianna
body:
Orianna in a white outfit, wearing a derby hat. She'd have long eyelashes on her right eye and her ball would be a mechanical orange.

I'm probably not the first one to imagine this skin, but I'd like it to be noticed. :D

replies.body:
Clicked on this thread, expecting a fruit-themed Orianna.

Pleasantly surprised. :D

OMGOMGOMGOMGOMGOMG A RED POST!!!

I thought this day would never come! :D

I see what you did there

the skin name could be "a clockwork Ori"

> [{quoted}](name=Tin Tarantino,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9XoNNfon,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-08T21:12:49.348+0000)
>
> I see what you did there
> 
> the skin name could be "a clockwork Ori"

Well, Orianna's title is *The Lady of Clockwork*, so I decided to put the missing element in the name.
*An Orianna Orange*, as suggested above, would fit better.

Incoming skin team: Fruity; The "Smoothiest" Champs On The Rift!

Featuring: 
Orange Orianna as mid!
Banana Queen Soraka as support!
Just Peachy Renekton as top!
Passionfruit Rammus as the jungler!
And Blood Cherry Jinx as ADC!
You know, Blood Cherry Jinx is a really great idea.
I like this idea, possibly different champs but a fruit theme pack would rock.
"Well well well well, what ha' we got 'ere? It's little Ori! Long time no viddy droogie!"

> [{quoted}](name=StoneColdSteve,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9XoNNfon,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-01-09T08:53:14.517+0000)
>
> "Well well well well, what ha' we got 'ere? It's little Ori! Long time no viddy droogie!"

I logged in to upvote this!!

"The Milkbar would sharpen you up and make you ready for a bit of the old ultra-violence."

"Come and get one in the yarbles, if ya have any yarbles"

-New Orianna taunts
Are there pictures you could add for reference? I'm having a hard time seeing this in my noodle brain haha
